wikipedia_page.main: Frank Ashcroft Judd, Baron Judd,  (28 March 1935 – 17 April 2021) was a British Labour politician. He was a Senior Fellow of Saferworld NGO from 1994 to 2002, and from 2002 to 2015, a trustee. In 2007, he became a member of the Advisory Board at the Centre for Human Rights, and from 2014 to 2015, a member of the Commission on Diplomacy, at the London School of Economics. He was a member of the Unite and GMB trade unions.

response: *1935 – Frank Judd, Baron Judd, English politician, Secretary of State for International Development (d. 2021)
